scripts.static: cd ../../ && rimraf static && cross-env NODE_ENV=production IS_STATIC=true babel-node ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/static/index.js && mv static/service-worker.js . && cd -
scripts.static-debug: cd ../../ && rimraf static && cross-env NODE_ENV=debug IS_STATIC=true node $NODE_DEBUG_OPTION -r babel-register ./node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack --progress --config webpack/static/index.js && mv static/service-worker.js . &&  cd -
